svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/7.1.9 Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Electron/1.7.5 Safari/537.36" version="7.1.9" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="5af0a3f3-8360-e64c-377a-6e537e229064" name="RIPv2 message format"></diagram></mxfile>

div.div: 1 to 25 routing entries per RIP message.
